content.rendered:
Directed by Ram Madhvani.

Written by Sanyuktha Chawla Shaikh.

Cast Sonam Kapoor(Neerja Bhanot). Shabana Azmi(Rama Bhanot). Yogendra Tikku(Harish Bhanot). Abrar Zahoor(Safarini). Jim Sarbh(Khalil). Ali Baldiwala(Mansoor). Vikrant Singta(Fahad). Parthaa Akerkar(Flight Passenger (as Parth Akerkar)). Madhu Anand Chandhock(Rahima Mohammed). Rahaao(Sadh Malik (Sub-Ordinate)) . Kirti Adarkar(Passenger). Hayder Ali(Passenger Munawar Masih). Amarjit(Passenger (Zayed Hasan)).Arjun Aneja. Yugesh Anil(Benett A). Bobby Arora(Sardar Family Friend). Rohit Assija(Mohammed Tariq). Sabreen Baker(Nupoor Abrool passenger). Freny Bhagat(Zubeida Mallick).Shashi Bhushan. Sonal Paresh Borkhatariya(Shabina Tariq). Dolly Bose(Simran Chandock). Gauransh Chauhan(Feature Dance With Sonam Kapoor). Rajan Chhabra(Rajan Mathais).Eisha Chopra. Shaurya Chopra(Shaurya Desai). Pankaj Chouhan(Passenger Rajiv Chouhan). Parimal Desai(Sunderesan). Prashantt Guptha(Rahul Kumar). Jenice(Sardar Wife). Shonita Joshi(Farhana Rizvi- Passenger). Danish Kalra(Passenger). Shaurya Kaushal(Krishnaveni Thanikmoni).Meghana Kaushik. Farrah Khan(Nazaria Begum). Waqar Khan(Co-Pilot Richard Bertrand). Anjali Khurana(Sharon). Alex Kozyrev(Ronnie Hatson). Svetlana Kurochkina(July Finiger). Amit Lekhwani(Passanger). Arnold Malek(Capt. Harrison James). Farzana Memon(Sardar’s Wife Family Friend). Khushnam Mistry(DAV Gayatri). Arush Nand(Arnavaz Irani).

Language Hindi.

Producers Harsh Dave. Deepika Gandhi. Akshiti Goleria. Atul Kasbekar. Amita Madhvani. Shanti Sivaram Maini. Rucha Pathak. Anup Poddar. Malika Singh.

Production Equinox Films. Fox STAR Studios.
